operations.notes:
Retrieves a Agilquest Analytics session token required to interact with the Agilquest Analytics platform. This session token is generated for the User whose SYSID is provided as a query parameter to this operation.

This operation requires a sysidUser query parameter of numeric type.

This operation returns a String session token key.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to request available resources or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
